column1: #Text=Speedo 's Pizza was late , so Scott got the two $ 9 medium pepperoni pizzas for free , tipping the embarrassed delivery boy $ 10 for his efforts .
#Text=Not his fault that his company makes absurd promises and contributes to the accident rate .
#Text=As 9:00 P.M. approached , Scott 's stomach knotted up .
#Text=He was n't quite sure what he would find when he dialed the Canadian number .

#Text=It was a cellular phone exchange meaning that while he dialed the Toronto 416 area code , the call was probably rerouted by call forwarding to another location , also connected by cellular phone .
#Text=Scott listened to the small speaker on his internal modem card as it dialed the tones in rapid sequence .
#Text=A click , a buzz and then in the background , Scott heard the faintest of tones .
#Text=Was that crosstalk from another line or was another secret number being dialed ?
#Text=The screen hesitated for few seconds then prompted . . .
#Text=Or the handle Kirk 's hackers gave him .
#Text=Again the computer display paused , seemingly pondering Scott 's response .
#Text=I SUPPOSE ASKING FOR FURTHER IDENTIFICATION WOULD OFFEND YOU .
#Text=Paranoia runs rampant in your line of work .
#Text=You ca n't keep your eyes off of Sonja 's chest as I recall .
#Text=I DON'T CARE WHAT , BUT I AM THE SPOOK AND ONLY THE SPOOK .
#Text=MY IDENTITY , IF I HAVE ONE , IS TO REMAIN MY LITTLE SECRET .
#Text=UNLESS YOU ACCEPT THAT , WE WILL GET NOWHERE FAST .
#Text=AND IF I WAS , IT WOULDN'T MATTER .
#Text=Let me see if I understand this right .
#Text=You will tell all , the whole story on the record , as long as you stay the Spook ?
#Text=Save it to disk , and give a copy to the lawyers .
#Text=Then we outline the terms and go .
#Text=YOU ARE THE FIRST REPORTER I'VE HEARD OF TO USE COMPUTERS AS A SOURCE .
#Text=Scott and the Spook exchanged notes over their modems and comput- ers until they arrived at terms they both could live with .
#Text=After Kirk , the rules Higgins had established were clear , easy to follow and fair .
#Text=Scott set his computer to Save the conversa- tion .
#Text=This is Scott Mason , speaking to a person who identifies himself only as the Spook .
#Text=I do not know the sex of this person , nor his appearance as all conversations are occurring over computer modem and telephone lines .
#Text=The Spook contacted me today , through my office computer .
#Text=I DESIGNED THE COMPUTER INVASION OF THE UNITED STATES FOR TAKI HOMOSOTO .
#Text=WOULD YOU LIKE TO KNOW HOW I DID IT ?
#Text=Marvin Jacobs had a busy day and evening .
#Text=And night , preparing for his meeting with the President .
#Text=He would have a chance to make his point , and win it , with an audience in attendance .
#Text=The high level bureaucrat craved to aspire within the echelons of the government hierarchy , but his inate competence prevented his goals from being realized .
#Text=Lt. Marvin Jacobs served his country as 90 day wonder straight out of ROTC .
#Text=A business major with a minor in civic administration did not prepare him for the tasks the Army had in store for him .
#Text=Army Intelligence was in desperate need of quality analysts , people with minds more than marshmallows for brain .
#Text=The Army Intelligence Division G-2 personnel staff poured through new recruit files in hopes of recruiting them into the voluntary program .
#Text=But the catch phrase , ' Military- Intelligence , ' a contradiction in terms ' made their job doubly difficult .

#Text=So they resorted to other tactics to recruit quali- fied people for an unpopular and often despised branch of the military : they made deals , and they made Lt. Marvin Jacobs a deal he could n't refuse .

#Text=Young Captain Jacobs returned to the United States at the end of the conflict as a highly skilled and experienced communications manager for the evolving communications technology ; as antiquated as it appears today .
#Text=His abilities were widely needed by emerg- ing factions of the government as McCarthyism and the fear of the Red Menace were substituted for Hot War .
#Text=The super secret NSA , whose existence was unknown to a vast majority of Congress at that time , made him the best offer from all the Federal Agencies .
#Text=The payscales were the same , but the working conditions promised were far superior at the Agency .
#Text=Marvin Jacobs had studied to serve as a civil servant , but he imagined himself in Tecumseh , Michigan politics , not confronting the Communist Threat .
#Text=He was rewarded for his efforts , handsomely .
#Text=In the sports world , they call it a signing bonus .
#Text=In the deep dark untrace- able world of the National Security Agency they call it All Paid Reconnaissance .
#Text=Travel when and where you like , ostensibly on behalf of your government .
#Text=If worse comes to worst , attend a half day seminar and make yourself seen .
